resources.string: \ This is an app that calculates the probability of drawing a certain card (out of multiple ones) from a deck of a certain size. It takes into consideration the number of copies in the deck, the number of cards in the deck, and how many draws happen.\n There is also the option to find the probability of drawing exactly a certain number of that card, or at least that many.
Please fill fields correctly, check 'How To' for more information.
